==Link
##{"block":"b-link"}##

Link block is ised inside other blocks.

For a simple like set the following bemjson:

{
   block: 'b-link',
   url: 'http://company.yandex.ru',
   title: 'Click here to learn more',
   target: '_blank',
   content: 'The best company all over the world'
}

An ##url## property transforms info ##href## attribute. ##title## and
##target## properties turn into relevant attributes.
===Block Modificators
 * disabled
   * yes
 * inner
   * yes
 * pseudo
   * yes
===Block Elements
 * inner
====Disabled link
##{"mods":{"disabled":"yes"}}##

Makes a link or a pseudolink disabled.
====The ##inner## modifier is given for a link including an element.\\
For a convinient usage of an icon inside a link.
##{"mods":{"inner":"yes"}}##

Позволяет добавлять в ссылку elem: 'inner'. Содержит только css,
которые переносит подчеркивание с самой ссылки на ее внутренний элемент.
====Pseudolink
##{"mods":{"pseudo":"yes"}}##

A ##pseudo## modifier is to mark a link that does not open on another page.
It has a dashed underline.
===Inner element
##{"elem":"inner"}##

This element is optional to contain a text of a link.
It is needed if a link includesgrafic content, e.g. an icon.
